mapper.insert: insert into shop(productId, title, image, lprice, maker) values(#{productId}, #{title}, #{image}, #{lprice}, #{maker});
mapper.select: select *, date_format(regdate, '%Y-%m-%d %T') as fmtdate, format(lprice, 0) as fmtprice from shop where title like concat('%', #{query}, '%') or maker like concat('%', #{query}, '%') order by pid desc limit #{start}, #{size};
